Text:
Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Upper Elementary. Limit the output to 100 words. Make sure the words 'fats' and'minerals' are included.
A healthy diet is crucial for your body to work properly. Nutrition is the study of how food affects the body. Food gives you energy and helps you grow. It's made up of different parts, such as carbohydrates, proteins, fats, and minerals. Carbohydrates give you energy, proteins help build and fix tissues, fats keep you warm, and minerals help your body function. Eating a variety of foods from different groups, like fruits, vegetables, grains, and meats, will give you the nutrients your body needs. A balanced diet is key to staying healthy and strong. Regular exercise and a healthy diet go hand-in-hand.
